nodes.text: The Herglic Alley was a hyperspace route that connected the planet Giju and the world of Byblos within the Colonies region of the galaxy. Giju acted as a junction between the Herglic Alley and the Rimma Trade Route, while Byblos acted as a junction to the Corellian Run. The route shared its name with the sentient Herglic species.

At some point prior to 10 BBY, the pirate queen Maz Kanata marked the Herglic Alley on a map in the book known as the Smuggler's Guide. The map's key identified the route as one of the "real" trade routes for smugglers to use, as opposed to the official ones.
The Herglic Alley was first mentioned in Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, a reference book written by Daniel Wallace and released in 2018.
